pkgmetadata.longdescription: ftpparser---------ftpparser is a Python 3 package for parsing FTP LIST results for a variety of FTP server formatsInstall:```bashpip3 install ftpparser```Usage:```pythonimport ftpparserparser = ftpparser.FTPParser()results = parser.parse(['-r-xr-xr-x 1 root wheel 3258128 Nov 20 2019 kernel.GENERIC'])name, size, timestamp, isdirectory, downloadable, islink, permissions = results[0]```
